The spirituall vvarfare a sermon preched in the parish church of St. Michael Crookedland in London : on the 30 of March being a fast day / by Mr. John Spencer sometime groom to a nobleman. Spencer, John, Groom.
16 p.
[s.n.] London : 1642.
Wing attributed to John Spender. Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
